name: Insomnia Demo (ggrachus)
description:
My first game. It is crude, terse, raw and ugly, so as Insomnia. Very shorts game revolves around the process of falling through weird worlds while not being able to sleep.

Very loosely based on my book about non-sleeping. Czech pdf here: https://monoskop.org/images/4/44/Janoscik_Vaclav_Nespavost_2018.pdf
